section1.title: 1. Platform Purpose
section1.content: Aroma Sense is an e-commerce platform specialized in perfumes, offering users the ability to explore, review and purchase products directly through the website, with payment via Pix or credit card. The platform also offers a personalized recommendation system with artificial intelligence, suggesting perfumes according to user preferences.

Notifying Aroma Sense if they suspect unauthorized use of their account.

features: Make purchases with payment via Pix or card;

section4.title: 4. Purchases, Payments and Deliveries
section4.content: Purchases made on Aroma Sense are subject to stock availability. Product shipping is done within 30 (thirty) business days from payment confirmation. Accepted payment methods are Pix and credit card, processed securely by our payment partners.
section4.notification: Users will receive information about order progress by email.

section5.title: 5. Returns and Refunds
section5.content: In accordance with the Consumer Protection Code, users may request product return or refund within 7 (seven) days after receipt, provided the product is sealed and in perfect condition. The return procedure will be informed by the support team via email

section9.title: 9. Account Suspension or Termination
section9.content: Aroma Sense may temporarily suspend or permanently delete user accounts in the following situations:
situations: Violation of Terms of Use: Misuse of the platform, spam, offensive or discriminatory content;
Fraud or Attempted Fraud: Use of false data, attempts to circumvent payments or compromise transactions;
Inappropriate Content: Publication of abusive, discriminatory, illegal comments or that violate third-party rights;
Security Compromise: Hacking attempts, vulnerability exploitation or use of automated tools without authorization;
Prolonged Inactivity: Abandoned accounts without use for more than 2 years;
Judicial Request: Compliance with legal orders, court decisions or requests from competent authorities.
processSteps: Prior email notification with detailed justification of the measure;
7-day period for contestation and defense presentation;
Analysis of contestation by support team within 5 business days;
Possibility of appeal against the decision with support (suporte.aromasense@gmail.com);
In cases of serious violation or imminent risk, immediate deactivation may occur without prior notification.
consequencesList: Temporary suspension: Access blocked for a determined period, with possibility of reactivation after correction of irregularities;

Permanent deletion: Definitive removal of account and personal data after 2-year retention period (except data necessary for legal compliance, which will be kept for up to 5 years). The deletion flow follows the deletion request process, 7-day reflection period, automatic system confirmation (if no cancellation) and subsequent data anonymization after the retention period.
section9.commitment: Aroma Sense is committed to acting proportionally, transparently and based on all account deactivation cases.
